short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Injects custom JavaScript into Bluesky for drafts and scheduled posts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a Draft and Schedule Post function to Bluesky.

You can save your drafts with a dedicated button and load them in separately through a popup menu. There is an autosave made of your latest typed messaged as the newest draft at the bottom of the popup every time you type either a new post or a reply.

For the schedule post a date input and button are added to the post screen. You enter the date and time you want the post to send and press the button to execute. As long as you keep an instance of bluesky open on your desktop in the browser with this addon the post will be send at the marked time.
You can make as many of these scheduled posts as you want.

If you clear cookies that removes the schedules and the drafts.
